headline.main: U.S. ARMY TO SEND MISSION TO RUSSIA; General Greely Heads Group of Experts Due to Leave Soon for Archangel U.S. ARMY TO SEND MISSION TO RUSSIA HEADS NEW MISSION

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Nov. 18 -- Major Gen. John N. Greely, until recently in command at Fort Sam Houston, one of the country's largest Army posts, is scheduled to leave soon for Archangel, Russian White Sea port, as the head of a large United States military mission in process of formation, responsible quarters reported today.
abstract: Heads U S mil mission to USSR; career; por
